name.japanese: 人間オークション会場

description: A large auction house on Grove 1 of Sabaody Archipelago where slaves, including humans, merfolk, and fishmen, were sold to the highest bidder. Euphemistically called the 'Public Employment Security Office' by the Marines. Previously owned by Donquixote Doflamingo and managed by Disco.

keyEvents.title: Rayleigh Unleashes Conqueror's Haki
keyEvents.description: Silvers Rayleigh demonstrates Conqueror's Haki for the first time, knocking out most people in the auction house.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Haki is first demonstrated and named in the anime.

keyEvents.title: Rayleigh Removes Camie's Collar
keyEvents.description: Rayleigh uses advanced Armament Haki to safely remove Camie's explosive slave collar.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates advanced Haki application and frees Camie from slavery.

keyEvents.title: First Mention of 'Haki' by Name
keyEvents.description: Hatchan explains that Rayleigh's power is called 'Haki,' introducing the term to the anime.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the fundamental power system of Haki is first named.

statusHistory.reason: Auction house is operational but under attack from Straw Hats

name.japanese: シャボンディ諸島グローブ1番

description: Grove 1 is part of the lawless area of Sabaody Archipelago (Groves 1-29) where pirates and bounty hunters operate freely. This grove houses the Human Auctioning House.

keyEvents.title: Marines Surround the Auction House
keyEvents.description: A large Marine force surrounds the Human Auctioning House with artillery, demanding the surrender of the Supernovas.
keyEvents.significance: The location becomes a battlefield between the Marines and the Worst Generation.

keyEvents.title: Three Supernovas Exit Together
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Kid, and Law walk out of the auction house together to face the Marines.
keyEvents.significance: Iconic location where three future Yonko commanders stand together.

keyEvents.title: Supernova Battle Against Marines
keyEvents.description: The three Supernova captains display their Devil Fruit powers against the Marine siege.
keyEvents.significance: First demonstration of Law and Kid's Devil Fruit abilities.

statusHistory.reason: Part of Sabaody Archipelago's lawless zone

description: An archipelago located near the Red Line, consisting of 79 groves formed by massive mangrove trees. It serves as the final stop before the New World and is known for its soap bubbles and lawless areas.

keyEvents.title: News Spreads of Celestial Dragon Attack
keyEvents.description: Word of Luffy striking a Celestial Dragon spreads rapidly across Sabaody Archipelago, causing widespread panic.
keyEvents.significance: The entire archipelago goes into chaos in anticipation of a Marine Admiral's arrival.

statusHistory.reason: Major hub before the New World

description: The headquarters of the Marines and the base of operations for the Fleet Admiral and the three Admirals. Located at Marineford.

keyEvents.title: Sengoku Dispatches Admiral Kizaru
keyEvents.description: Fleet Admiral Sengoku orders Admiral Kizaru to go to Sabaody Archipelago immediately to respond to the attack on Saint Charlos.
keyEvents.significance: The decision made here will lead to the separation of the Straw Hat crew.
